flavorText: Even the putrid muscles of the dead can provide strength to those loathsome enough to consume them.
name: Eater of the Dead
originalText: Untap Eater of the Dead: Remove target creature card in a graveyard from the game.

rulings.text: It untaps during the resolution of its ability.
You can activate the ability whether or not Eater of the Dead is tapped. However, if Eater of the Dead is untapped when the ability resolves, the ability won’t do anything.

text: {0}: If Eater of the Dead is tapped, exile target creature card from a graveyard and untap Eater of the Dead.
